overview: Music & Musicals, Rap & Hip-Hop, Urban & Dance - The four foundations of the hip-hop movement -- the B-boy, the graffiti artist, the DJ and the emcee -- are saluted in this comprehensive documentary, which thoroughly explores the Miami scene. The film features art by Dash 167 and Marley; interviews and performances by Gang Starr, Grandmaster Melle Mel, KRS-One and Invisible Skratch Piklz; and a visit to the International Turntablist Federation's world finals.
title: Hip Hop Massive
